description: This source file defines a React functional component 'RestaurantList' that displays a list of restaurants in a grid layout, including images, names, cuisines, ratings, and descriptions. It manages state using React hooks and navigates to detailed pages upon clicking a restaurant.

methods.name: RestaurantList()
methods.description: Main functional component that displays a list of restaurants.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.description: Handles navigation to the restaurant details page when a restaurant card is clicked.
